alert.note: Alert for Barry (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 04 at 7:18PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Barry County through 800 PM CDT... At 718 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Washburn to Garfield to 6 miles northwest of War Eagle. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Roaring River State Park, Table Rock Lake, Cassville, Shell Knob, Seligman, Exeter, Butterfield, Washburn, Golden, Emerald Beach, Eagle Rock, Chain-O-Lakes, Arrow Point, Wheelerville, Jenkins, Wayne, Mcdowell and Madry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
